reviews.review: I like this game so much. Sometimes I get frustrated over the matchmaking because it's not often balanced but you have to get along and improve, right?
I rate this game 2/10 because there is a lot cheaters.

a lot of hackers and very bad matchmaking.

The game itself is actually good, however i keep getting 7 day cool downs from competitive for things that should be like a 2 hour cool down, even when i'm trying to play competitively. It is actually very annoying because I've had quite a few of these 7 day cool downs now in such little time and its really starting to piss me off. i'm actually debating on whether to uninstall the game or not. If i didn't pay good money for some of my decent skins i probably would've uninstalled the game a while ago. Something needs to change, I've been playing this game for a few years on this account and another account that got hacked and this has never happened to me before constantly getting 7 day cool downs.

That is one factor of CS I love. It puts everybody on equal ground, the difference being with your skill level, which will vary based on how much you're willing to improve on. Unlike COD where if one player has the right combination of weapons/kill streaks  they can win pretty much every round with minimal effort. That to me is very cheap and unfair.
